waffleoRai_cafebotCommands

Interface Command

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CMD_AddBirthday, CMD_BadCommandMessage, CMD_CancelEvent, CMD_ChChan, CMD_CleanMessages, CMD_Eventhelp, CMD_GetTZ, CMD_Help, CMD_InsufficientArgs, CMD_NewMemberNotify, CMD_OtherBotHandledMessage, CMD_ParserBlockWarn, CMD_qChan, CMD_SaySomething, CMD_SeeEvents, CMD_SeeTZ, CMD_SetTZ, CMD_SOR, CMD_UpdateStatusAtShift, CMD_WishBirthday, CommandAdapter

    public interface Command
    A basic interface for executable bot commands.
    Since:
    July 1, 2018
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Blythe Hospelhorn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute_confirm(AbstractBot bot)
      Execute the procedure that should be executed upon user confirmation using the referenced bot.
      void execute_reject(AbstractBot bot)
      Execute the procedure that should be executed upon user cancellation using the referenced bot.
      void execute_rerequest(AbstractBot bot)
      Execute the procedure that should be executed upon automatic rejection of user input using the referenced bot.
      void execute_timeout(AbstractBot bot)
      Execute the procedure that should be executed upon user prompt timeout using the referenced bot.
      void execute(AbstractBot bot)
      Execute command or initial phase of command (such as a prompt for user confirmation) using the provided bot.

    • Method Detail

        Execute command or initial phase of command (such as a prompt for user confirmation) using the provided bot.

        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If bot is null.
